name: EVA Hot Melt Adhesive
description: Excellent bonding strength for packaging applications with fast setting time and superior adhesion to various substrates.
fullDescription: EVA (Ethylene Vinyl Acetate) Hot Melt Adhesive offers outstanding performance in high-speed packaging lines. This thermoplastic adhesive provides excellent initial tack and fast setting speed.

name: Pressure Sensitive Adhesive
description: FDA compliant adhesive for food packaging with excellent tack and peel strength.
fullDescription: Premium pressure sensitive adhesive designed specifically for food contact applications. Meets FDA 21 CFR 175.105 requirements for indirect food contact.

name: Polyamide Hot Melt
description: High performance adhesive with excellent heat resistance and chemical resistance for demanding applications.
fullDescription: Polyamide-based hot melt adhesive ideal for applications requiring superior heat and chemical resistance. Perfect for automotive and industrial bonding.

name: Metallocene Hot Melt
description: Advanced metallocene technology for superior clarity and adhesion on difficult substrates.
fullDescription: Next-generation hot melt adhesive using metallocene polyolefin technology. Offers exceptional clarity and performance on LDPE and polypropylene substrates.

name: PSA Tape Grade
description: Specially formulated for tape manufacturing with controlled tack and cohesion.
fullDescription: Professional grade pressure sensitive adhesive optimized for tape converting applications. Balanced tack and cohesion for various tape constructions.

name: Bookbinding Hot Melt
description: Flexible spine adhesive for perfect binding applications with excellent page pull strength.
fullDescription: Specialized hot melt adhesive for book manufacturing. Provides durable yet flexible spine bonds with excellent page pull and aging resistance.

name: EVA Copolymer Resin
description: High VA content copolymer for superior flexibility and low temperature performance.
fullDescription: EVA copolymer resin with high vinyl acetate content. Excellent for formulating flexible adhesives and coatings with enhanced low temperature properties.

name: Alkyd Resin - Short Oil
description: Superior gloss and flexibility for industrial coatings with excellent drying properties.
fullDescription: Short oil alkyd resin optimized for industrial coating applications. Provides excellent gloss retention and fast drying times.

name: Polyester Resin
description: Excellent chemical and weather resistance for powder coatings and liquid finishes.
fullDescription: High-performance saturated polyester resin designed for demanding coating applications. Outstanding chemical resistance and weather durability.

name: Acrylic Resin Solution
description: Fast drying acrylic resin for architectural and automotive coatings with excellent UV resistance.
fullDescription: Premium acrylic resin solution offering exceptional clarity and UV resistance. Ideal for high-performance automotive and architectural coatings.

name: Epoxy Resin
description: Two-component epoxy system for high performance industrial coatings and adhesives.
fullDescription: High molecular weight epoxy resin for formulating durable industrial coatings. Excellent chemical resistance and mechanical properties.
specifications: {"epoxy_equivalent": "450-550 g/eq", "viscosity": "10000-16000 cps @ 25°C", "color": "Clear to Pale Yellow", "density": "1.16-1.18 g/cm³"}

name: Polyurethane Resin
description: Flexible polyurethane resin for elastomeric coatings with excellent abrasion resistance.
fullDescription: Polyurethane resin system for high-performance flexible coatings. Superior abrasion and impact resistance for demanding applications.

name: Hydrocarbon Resin
description: Tackifying resin for adhesives and coatings with excellent compatibility.
fullDescription: Aliphatic hydrocarbon resin providing excellent tackification for hot melt and pressure sensitive adhesive formulations.

name: Rosin Ester
description: Natural based tackifier with excellent initial tack for adhesive formulations.
fullDescription: Modified rosin ester resin offering excellent tack and adhesion properties. Natural-based tackifier for environmentally conscious formulations.

name: Titanium Dioxide Pigment
description: High opacity white pigment for paints and coatings with excellent hiding power.
fullDescription: Premium grade rutile titanium dioxide pigment offering superior opacity and brightness. Treated for optimal dispersion in various coating systems.

name: Iron Oxide Red
description: Synthetic iron oxide red pigment with excellent lightfastness and weather resistance.
fullDescription: High-quality synthetic iron oxide red pigment for architectural and industrial coatings. Superior color consistency and durability.

name: Carbon Black
description: High tinting strength carbon black for coatings and plastics with excellent UV protection.
fullDescription: Premium furnace carbon black with exceptional tinting strength and UV protection properties. Ideal for automotive and industrial coatings.

name: Chrome Yellow
description: Bright yellow pigment for industrial coatings with excellent hiding power.
fullDescription: Lead chromate yellow pigment providing brilliant yellow shades for industrial applications. Excellent opacity and chemical resistance.

name: Phthalocyanine Blue
description: High performance organic blue pigment with excellent lightfastness and color strength.
fullDescription: Copper phthalocyanine blue pigment offering exceptional color strength and lightfastness. Premium grade for automotive and industrial coatings.

name: Ultramarine Blue
description: Inorganic blue pigment with excellent heat stability and pH resistance.
fullDescription: Synthetic ultramarine blue pigment providing bright blue shades with excellent heat and alkaline resistance. Ideal for architectural coatings.
